page_content:
Zoom Boxes

Version:MissionOS_2.0

The MissionOS application portal features Zoomboxes in the maps it displays.

Zoomboxes in maps are interactive tools or visual elements that allow users to zoom into a specific area of interest on a project that you need to access regularly. This tool helps users in the application with enhanced navigation and exploration functions. You can toggle on/off these zoomboxes in the map view. Once this option is ‘ON’, all the zoom boxes present in the portal is highlighted in blue boxes. You can click these ON to zoom into the boxes.

You can perform the following steps to access the page to configure zoomboxes:

  1. Log into the MissionOS portal.
  2. Click open the Data Manager.

In Data Manager, navigate to Admin > Setup > Zoom Boxes

 

 

  1. In the Zoom box page, enter the values for Top Left E, Top Left N, Bottom Right E and Bottom Right N.
  2. Type the Zoom Box Name.
  3. Select Assign to a Contract if required.
  4. If Assign to a Contract is selected, you can select the Project and Contract as they populate.
  5. Click Save Zoom Box.
    Once done save and return to the Portal to see the zoom box.

 

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on How to Setup Zoom Boxes, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:

videos.title: How To: Setup Zoom Boxes in MissionOS
